sentence.Network_en: Fears about the solvency of the banks precipitated the great economic crash.
sentence.Network_cn: 对银行偿付能力出现恐慌更加速了经济的崩溃.

sentence.Network_cn: 其指标包括盈利比率 、 偿债能力比率 、 资产管理比率.

sentence.Network_en: We must demonstrate solvency in every project introduced from abroad.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们引进每一个项目都要做到必须具有偿付能力.

entry.def: A person or organization's  solvency is their ability to pay their debts.

means.word_mean: 1. the ability to meet maturing obligations as they come due
